trans-unit.source: Comprises extended utility methods for constructing a task that wraps a command line tool.

Fills the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension"></xref> with the switches and other information that the command line tool must run from the command line and not from a response file.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension"></xref> to fill.
Fills the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension"></xref> with the switches and other information that the command line tool can run from a response file.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension"></xref> to fill.
Gets the collection of parameters used by the derived task class.
The collection of parameters used by the derived task class.
Gets the switches and other information that the command line tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
A string containing the switches and other information that the command line tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
Gets the switch used by the command line tool to specify the response file.
The switch used by the command line tool to specify the response file.
Gets the value of the specified Boolean parameter.
If `parameterName` does not exist in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension.Bag%2A>, `defaultValue` is returned.
The name of the parameter to return.
The value to return if `parameterName` does not exist in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension.Bag*>.
The parameter value.
Gets the value of the specified integer parameter.
If `parameterName` does not exist in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension.Bag%2A>, `defaultValue` is returned.
The name of the parameter to return.
The value to return if `parameterName` does not exist in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension.Bag*>.
The parameter value.
Returns whether this ToolTask has logged any errors.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ToolTask logged errors, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if otherwise.
Gets an instance of a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskLoggingHelperExtension"></xref> class containing task logging methods.
An instance of a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskLoggingHelperExtension"></xref> class containing task logging methods.
